features: ⭐[Upgraded Multifunction Wooden Blocks & Easy Storage]: Our wooden toys includes storage pull car, 30 pieces wooden blocks. Each block side with colorful design including 180pcs alphabet uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbol, shapes, animals, fruits, vegetables, daily necessities etc. Wooden push & pull toy wagon is easy for kids to drag, carry and store the blocks in an organized way.

🌟[Durable & Continued Practicality]: Our wooden building blocks can grow with your baby child and the durable design could last for years. It‘s not only a wooden stacking toy but also a preschool learning activies helping toddlers learning letters, words, numbers, daily necessities, animals, etc. in a fun way in pre-kindergarten. Alphabet blocks with vivid colors and patterns will delight children's eyes.

🌠[High-quality & Safe]: Professional wooden toys for child! This educational building block set is made of 100% non-toxic nature wood with water-based paint. Polishing and rounding process, so the edges of wooden building blocks and pull toy car are smooth, safe for baby's skin!

✨[Learning Educational Toys for Age 1-3]: Learning the alphabet and building words in the process of stacking blocks is a great way to learn the basic phonics needed for reading and helps with early language development in young children. Let your child learn in a stress-free environment. A preschool must-have Montessori toys for fine motor skills development and great for hand-eye coordination and problem-solving.

🤩[Ideal Gifts for Kids]: Building blocks for toddlers 1-3 is a multisensory preschool learning activities, educational toys for 2 year old, montessori toys for 1 2 3 year old, a great educational toy for 1 2 3 year old preschool, kindergarten, boys and girls. Perfect back to school, birthday gift, Christmas gift, New Year gift. 90 days after-sales service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will solve them for you the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs a much longer sting to pull the block wagon around
reviews.reviewText: The string is entirely too short to be able to pull this wagon around the house by a small child....that is a big bummer.This is not a wood block set that will be around for generations to come.....they are basically cheap wood of some sort. I don't believe that these will last through hard play by toddlers for more than a year or so...I will come back to the review in the future to update.The blocks are really small.....nothing like the solid wood blocks that I had as a child but I guess I am old at 55! I don't think that these blocks are so small that they are a choking hazard, I mean they are square and larger than something you could swallow so I don't think you have to worry about that....but one never knows.The blocks are colorful, capture the attention of toddlers and offer learning experiences. They are obviously great for learning how to stack! You can easily start to introduce these blocks to a baby that can sit up themselves. You can show them each block and talk about the pictures on the block. Learning primary colors is another benefit of these blocksKinda expensive for lower quality, small, wood blocks. Not sure that I would give as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good learning gift for Christmas
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got these little wooden blocks for my baby niece for Christmas. The blocks itself looks sturdy and I believe this is something she will drag around her mom's house especially with the wheel. Some of the paint seems to be lifting already and Iam a little concern with that however I be wrapping it and putting it under the Christmas tree.

reviews.reviewText: Toddler loves the blocks and they are small for small hands
